display_long_description:
🔹 RawRun – The Ultimate VR Longboard Downhill Racing Experience! 🔹

Step into the world of high-speed thrills with RawRun, the most intense and stylish VR longboard & skateboard racing game on Meta Quest! Designed for adrenaline lovers and extreme sports fans, RawRun drops you into steep mountain slopes and chaotic urban runs where speed, balance, and pure skill are everything.

💨 Race at Breakneck Speeds
Carve your way downhill with insane velocity. Master sharp turns, navigate narrow paths, and boost through dangerous sections.

🛹 Perform Big Air Jumps & Tricks
Take on ramps and ledges to perform gravity-defying jumps

⚡ Dynamic Courses with Obstacles
Challenge yourself across themed tracks filled with hazards, drift zones and more.

🎮 Optimized for VR
Feel every twist and turn with immersive controls and intuitive gameplay, built specifically for Meta Quest.

Whether you're a skateboarding pro or a VR thrill-seeker, RawRun will push your reflexes to the edge. 

Ready to ride?
